mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS org_id , t.name AS org_name, t.wx_account , t.ali_account FROM ( SELECT o.id , o.type , o.name , os.wx_account , os.ali_account, CASE WHEN os.wx_account IS NOT NULL AND os.ali_account IS NOT NULL THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS is_setting FROM organization o LEFT JOIN t_org_setting os ON o.id = os.org_id ) t WHERE FIND_IN_SET(t.id , getOrgChildren(#{orgId})) AND t.type = 1 AND t.is_setting = #{isSetting}
